verbs.description: There [V: is] [ARG1: a real possibility of diverging summits wherein the inter - Korean summit is successful] , but the Trump - Kim summit is not .
There is a real possibility of [V: diverging] [ARG0: summits] wherein the inter - Korean summit is successful , but the Trump - Kim summit is not .
There is a real possibility of [ARGM-LOC: diverging summits] [R-ARGM-LOC: wherein] [ARG1: the inter - Korean summit] [V: is] [ARG2: successful] , but the Trump - Kim summit is not .
There is a real possibility of diverging summits wherein the inter - Korean summit is successful , but [ARG1: the Trump - Kim summit] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] .
